title: notblox1
author: notblox1
content: If you like to play video games in your free time now you can do it on your smartphone and earn Bitcoin for that.THNDR is a gaming platform with mobile games and applications that is offering real-world rewards in form of Bitcoin, and they are available for Android and iOS devices.People who like Snake, Tetris, Cards, Racing and other games can now install one or more THNDR games and earn sats in your Lightning wallets.Currently available games:1. Tetro Tiles is a puzzle style game with Sudoku style grid:https://www.thndr.games/bitcoin-games/bitcoin-blocks2. Club Bitcoin: Solitaire is a known card game with Bitcoin rewards:https://www.thndr.games/bitcoin-games/bitcoin-solitaire3. Bitcoin Bounce is a game of bouncing along the Blockchain, trying not to fall:https://www.thndr.games/bitcoin-games/bitcoin-bounce4. Turbo 84 is great if you like racing games:https://www.thndr.games/bitcoin-games/turbo-845. Bitcoin snake is a game best known for old Nokia phones:https://www.thndr.games/bitcoin-games/bitcoin-snake6. Bitcoin Bay is aa bubble shooter game:https://www.thndr.games/bitcoin-games/bitcoin-bayhttps://www.thndr.games/What is your favorite THNDR game?

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on May 31, 2023, 08:47:00 PMQuote from: yahoo62278 on May 31, 2023, 08:30:30 PM-snip-All the games are on Apps.I joined their community and searched for the topic you are asking. Yes, their game has some ads and the business scheme they're using (the revenue they get from the ads are being converted into sat and paid to the user).They aren't giving a lot of Satoshi to a user for playing the games. I have tested one of their games and they amount of Satoshi they're paying is very low. I have installed their Tetris game after reading this post and the result wasn't satisfying because you'll get less than 200 Satoshi if you play the game for an hour.The apps are full of ads, and whenever you lose a game you are forced to watch a video ad. The experience is annoying because sometimes you lose 2 times within 5 minutes and you'll have to watch a 40 second long ad to replay the game. The only good thing about those games is their free nature. You earn for playing, I know the earnings are very low but for some people those earnings are enough because they can enjoy playing the games. In the example of Tetris game they have hourly draw and I think they share around 1000 or 10000 Satoshi per hour for the players.

You're not going to get rich playing this, be happy you can make a few cents in your spare time.I am trying some of their games and the amount of ads you have to watch is way less then I was expecting, so not annoying at all.Also be aware you are not awarded sats directly when playing but you earn tickets for a raffle, held every few hours or so, and the amount of tickets you can earn are related to the gameplay; for every raffle you are displayed the amount of sats in the jackpot (I guess they are proportional to the number of players playing that specific game in that raffle), there a re different prizes in every raffle so the sats prizes are awarded randomly.Good way to stack some sats in your free time, could be good to bring people close to crypto maybe, but nothing but nothing worth investing too much time in.
